name: SUNNOVA ENERGY CORPORATION
sampleDescriptions: Oppose ITC case and proposed tariffs on solar cells.
Support tax policies allowing deployment of residential solar on a competitive basis.
Support programs and legislation encouraging competition in energy markets.  Support greater transparency and consumer protections for residential solar providers.

Support programs and legislation encouraging competition in energy markets.  Support greater transparency and consumer protections for residential solar providers.
